query: SELECT rq.id, rq.lojaId, rq.dataReuniao, rq.estado, rq.createdAt, l.nome as lojaNome FROM reunioes_quinzenais rq LEFT JOIN lojas l ON rq.lojaId = l.id ORDER BY rq.createdAt DESC LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT rq.id, rq.lojaId, rq.dataReuniao, rq.estado, rq.createdAt, l.nome as lojaNome FROM reunioes_quinzenais rq LEFT JOIN lojas l ON rq.lojaId = l.id ORDER BY rq.createdAt DESC LIMIT 20;
